eu.infomas.dropbox

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.infomas.dropbox.RestClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleRestClient

    public abstract class RestClient
extends Object
    RestClient defines the interface for a simple HTTP(S) REST client, used by Dropbox. It is not a general purpose REST Client! Functionality is very simple and "just enough" for getting Dropbox working. Actual implementations must extend this class and are discovered via the standard Java service-provider loading facility.
    Since:
    infomas-asl 3.0.2
    Author:
    Ronald K. Muller

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static RestClient newInstance()
        Return an concrete implementation of a RestClient. The standard Java service-provider loading facility is used. If no implementation is found, SimpleRestClient is used. If several implementations are available, the first found on the class path is used and a warning is logged.
        Note that this factory method always returns a newly created instance.

      • asString

        public abstract String asString(Request request)
                         throws IOException
        Execute the specified Request and return the response body (payload) as a String.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The response message body as String
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        responseStream - The data from the response message body (payload)
        Throws:
